exceptions.tactic: apply (is_RInt_minus f Fa Fb lf g lg Hf Hg).
exceptions.exn: In environment V : NormedModule R_AbsRing Fa, Fb : (R -> Prop) -> Prop FFa : Filter Fa FFb : Filter Fb f, g : R -> V lf, lg : V H : is_RInt_gen f Fa Fb lf H0 : is_RInt_gen g Fa Fb lg Hf : V -> Prop Hg : locally (minus lf lg) Hf The term "Fa" has type "(R -> Prop) -> Prop" while it is expected to have type "R -> V" (cannot unify "R" and "R -> Prop").

original: intros. unfold is_RInt_gen. intros Hf Hg. unfold is_RInt_gen in Hf, Hg. unfold is_RInt_gen. apply (is_RInt_minus f Fa Fb lf g lg Hf Hg).
